packageActivityPlugin.pluginProperties: {"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.BeanShellTool","properties":{"script":";"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"update app_fd_demande_reclamation
-- SET c_statut = 
-- CASE
-- WHEN '#variable.validation_chef_agent#' = 'oui' THEN 
-- CASE 
-- WHEN '#variable.decision_agent#' in ('') THEN
-- ELSE
-- WHEN performance_rating = 'Good' THEN salary * 1.05
-- ELSE salary
-- END
-- WHERE salary > 3000;
","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pmt
SET c_statut_enquete = 
 CASE
 WHEN '#variable.validation_chef_agent#' = 'oui' THEN 
 CASE 
 WHEN '#variable.decision_agent#' IN ('Passer à une enquête urgente', 'Passer à une enquête classique') THEN 'A enquêter'
 WHEN '#variable.decision_agent#' = 'Passer à une validation communautaire' THEN 'A valider'
 ELSE c_statut_enquete
 END
 ELSE
 CASE 
 WHEN '#variable.decision_finale#' IN ('Passer à une enquête urgente', 'Passer à une enquête classique') THEN 'A enquêter'
 WHEN '#variable.decision_finale#' = 'Passer à une validation communautaire' THEN 'A valider'
 ELSE c_statut_enquete
 END
 END
WHERE id = (
 SELECT pmt.id 
 FROM app_fd_table_individus i 
 JOIN app_fd_d_preinscription p ON (p.c_npi = i.c_numero_npi)
 JOIN app_fd_pmt pmt ON (i.c_id_enquete = pmt.id) 
 WHERE p.c_npi = '#variable.npi#'
 LIMIT 1
);","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pmt\nSET c_statut_enquete = 'A vérifier'\nWHERE id = '#form.pmt.id#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"Update app_fd_pmt \nSet c_statut_enquete = 'A corriger'\nwhere id = '#form.pmt.id#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"update app_fd_dossier_commission set c_issaved = 'true' where c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"update app_fd_radiation set c_activityprocessid='#assignment.processId#' where id='#variable.processID#'","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}
{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"","properties":{}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_dossier_commission 
SET c_issaved = '' 
WHERE c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#'
AND c_id_dossier IN (
 SELECT pm.id 
 FROM app_fd_pmt pm 
 JOIN app_fd_dossier_commission dc 
 ON dc.c_id_dossier = pm.id
 WHERE dc.c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#' 
 AND (pm.c_categorie_commission IS NULL OR pm.c_categorie_commission = '')
);","jdbcDatasource":"default"}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"update app_fd_pmt set c_statut_enquete = 'Traitée par la commission' where id in (select pm.id from app_fd_pmt pm join app_fd_dossier_commission dc on (dc.c_id_dossier=pm.id and c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#' ) where c_categorie_commission is null or c_categorie_commission = '' )","jdbcDatasource":"default"}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_dossier_commission 
SET c_issaved = 'done' 
WHERE c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#'
AND c_id_dossier IN (
 SELECT pm.id 
 FROM app_fd_pmt pm 
 JOIN app_fd_dossier_commission dc 
 ON dc.c_id_dossier = pm.id
 WHERE dc.c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#' 
 AND NOT (pm.c_categorie_commission IS NULL OR pm.c_categorie_commission = '')
);","jdbcDatasource":"default"}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"update app_fd_d_preinscription
Set c_statut_demande='Traitée par la commission'
where c_id_enquete in (Select c_id_enquete from app_fd_pmt where c_statut_enquete = 'Traitée par la commission' )","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

{"runInMultiThread":"","comment":"","tools":[{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_pmt 
SET c_statut_enquete = 'traiter par la commission' 
FROM app_fd_dossier_commission adc
WHERE app_fd_pmt.c_categorie_commission IS NOT NULL 
 AND app_fd_pmt.c_categorie_commission <> '' 
 AND app_fd_pmt.id = adc.c_id_dossier
 AND adc.c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#';
","jdbcDatasource":"default"}},{"className":"org.joget.apps.app.lib.DatabaseUpdateTool","properties":{"query":"UPDATE app_fd_d_preinscription pre
SET c_statut_demande = 'traiter par la commission'
FROM app_fd_dossier_commission adc
JOIN app_fd_pmt pmt ON pmt.id = adc.c_id_dossier
WHERE pmt.c_categorie_commission IS NOT NULL 
 AND pmt.c_categorie_commission <> '' 
 AND adc.c_id_commission = '#variable.processID#'
 AND pre.id = pmt.id;
","jdbcDatasource":"default"}}]}

datalistDefinition.name: listes_enquetes_vis_notif
datalistDefinition.json:
{"id":"vis_listes_enquetes","name":"listes_enquetes_vis_notif","pageSize":"0","pageSizeSelectorOptions":"10,20,30,40,50,100","order":"","orderBy":"","description":"","actions":[],"rowActions":[],"filters":[],"binder":{"className":"org.melkart.plugin.JdbcDatalistBinder","properties":{"querySource":"sql","sql":"SELECT dp.c_npi, dp.c_nom, dp.c_prenom, dp.c_pid, dp.c_statut_demande, dp.c_compagne_enquete , dp.c_adresse
FROM app_fd_planif_enquete pf, app_fd_d_preinscription dp
WHERE (pf.c_compagne_enquete = dp.c_compagne_enquete)
AND ((pf.c_chef_equipe = '#currentUser.username#') OR (pf.c_equipe_enquete LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%'))
AND (dp.c_pid = '#requestParam.pid#')
